prefecture_code.description: JIS X 0401の都道府県コード(01~41),Prefecture Code in JIS X 0401. The value ranges from '01' to '47'.

designated_city_code.description: 特別区の区域及び指定都市の市区町村コード(100~199),Municipality code for Designated Cities and the area of Special Wards.The value ranges from '100' to '199'.

ward_code.description: 特別区及び指定都市の区の市区町村コード(101~199),Municipality code for Special Wards and wards in Designated Cities.The value ranges from '100' to '199'.

city_code.description: 指定都市ではない市の市区町村コード(201~299),Municipality code for nomal Cities.The value ranges from '100' to '199'.
